arabicText: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ

translations.en: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,
translations.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ

translations.en: obeying its Sustainer, as in truth it must;
and when the earth is leveled,
and casts forth whatever is in it, and becomes utterly void,
obeying its Sustainer, as in truth it must -:

arabicText: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحࣰا فَمُلَـٰقِیهِ

translations.en: [then,] O man - thou [that] hast, verily, been toiling towards thy Sustainer in painful toil - then shalt thou meet Him!
translations.ar: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحࣰا فَمُلَـٰقِیهِ

translations.en: And as for him whose record shall be placed in his right hand,
he will in time be called to account with an easy accounting,
and will [be able to] turn joyfully to those of his own kind.

arabicText: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

translations.en: But as for him whose record shall be given to him behind his back;
translations.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

translations.en: he will in time pray for utter destruction:
but he will enter the blazing flame.
Behold, [in his earthly life] he lived joyfully among people of his own kind
for, behold, he never thought that he would have to return [to God].

arabicText: بَلَىٰۤۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِیرࣰا

translations.en: Yea indeed! His Sustainer did see all that was in him!
translations.ar: بَلَىٰۤۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِیرࣰا

translations.en: BUT NAY! I call to witness the sunset's [fleeting] afterglow,
and the night, and what it [step by step] unfolds,
and the moon, as it grows to its fullness:
[even thus, O men,] are you bound to move; onward from stage to stage.
What, then, is amiss with them that they will not believe [in a life to come]?

arabicText: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا یَسۡجُدُونَ ۩

translations.en: and [that], when the Qur’an is read unto them, they do not fall down in prostration?
translations.ar: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا یَسۡجُدُونَ ۩

translations.en: Nay, but they who are bent on denying the truth give the lie [to this divine writ]!
Yet God has full knowledge of what they conceal [in their hearts].
Hence, give them the tiding of grievous suffering [in the life to come] –

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

translations.en: unless it be such [of them] as [repent, and] attain to faith, and do good works: for theirs shall be a reward unending!.
translations.ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
